name: Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning 1.3.1
name_original: Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning 1.3.1
description:
Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning 1.3.1 is an educational game developed by AhmedFareed23. It was originally released in 2020. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning 1.3.1 is available on PC and Linux. The game is sold via itch.io.
